karyChat.karyResponseSuffix: Remember I am a language model and can make mistakes.

myTasks.pageSubtitle: Here you can see and manage all your assigned tasks.
myTasks.noTasksSubtitle: Looks like you're all caught up. Good job!

studentReports.pageSubtitle: Check your progress and performance reports.
studentReports.noReportsSubtitle: No reports have been generated for you yet.

supportPlans.pageSubtitle: Review the support plans designed for you.
supportPlans.noPlansSubtitle: You currently have no support plans assigned.

personalTrackingPage.title: My Personal Tracking
personalTrackingPage.subtitle: Log how you feel and your reflections.
personalTrackingPage.descriptionLabel: How are you feeling today? Describe your day.
personalTrackingPage.descriptionPlaceholder: Write your thoughts, emotions, or important events here...
personalTrackingPage.selectTagsLabel: Select tags that describe your state:
personalTrackingPage.noTagsOrClassifications: No tags or classifications available at this moment.
personalTrackingPage.successMessage: Your emotional log has been saved successfully!
personalTrackingPage.errorMessage: Error saving your log. Please try again.
personalTrackingPage.errorUserNotLoaded: User not loaded. Cannot save log.
personalTrackingPage.errorDescriptionRequired: Description is required to save the log.
personalTrackingPage.analysisInProgressMessage: We are processing your information to offer you the best support.
personalTrackingPage.noSuggestion: No specific suggestions at this time.

learningResourcesPage.subtitle: Explore a variety of materials to boost your development.
learningResourcesPage.noUrlProvided: This resource does not have an associated URL.
learningResourcesPage.searchPlaceholder: Search resources by title, description, or tag...
learningResourcesPage.noSearchResults: No resources found for "{searchTerm}". Try another search.
learningResourcesPage.tryDifferentFilters: Try changing filters or check back later.

assignedResourcesPage.subtitle: Here you will find the materials your educators have selected for you.

settingsPageSubtitle: Manage your profile, preferences, and security.
